coreAttributes.name: Hama Yumi
coreAttributes.description: A yumi crafted for the youko lilin to smite those who threaten the weak. Arcane arrows fired from this weapon strike hard, strike true, and with grace to match.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] the Hama Yumi, readying it for combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Taking aim with [npc.her] yumi, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest; the ethereal arcane arrow passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Taking aim with [npc.her] yumi, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal arrow and drain [npc2.her] energy!
With a bated breath, [npc.name] looses an etherial arrow at [npc2.name], sinking into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: With focused breath [npc.name] let loose a charged arrow delivering a devastating shot to [npc2.her] neck!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] yumi, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to strike [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] yumi, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a bated breath, [npc.name] looses an etherial arrow at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] yumi, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
